text: aur (ai rasool) inako vah vakt to yaad dilao jab khuda ne ahale kitaab se ehad va paimaan liya tha ki tum kitaabe khuda ko saaf saaf bayaan kar dena aur (khabaradaar) usakee koee baat chhupaana nahin magar in logon ne (zara bhee khyaal na kiya) aur unako pase pusht phenk diya aur usake badale mein (bas) thodee see qeemat haasil kar lee pas ye kya hee bura (sauda) hai jo ye log khareed rahe hain
